description: Himari heads back to the hospital for a check-up, and Shoma is glad to find out from the doctor that she seems to be in perfect health. Meanwhile, Kamba is back at the house speaking with his uncle, who is looking into selling the Takakura house. Kamba, on the other hand, is determined to both keep the house and the family together.

titles.title: C`est pour ça que je le ferai
Dakara Boku wa Sore o Suru no sa
だから僕はそれをするのさ
